Package ooga.model.components.turnconditions

Interface TurnCondition

All Known Implementing Classes:
CheckersTurnCondition, ConstantTurnCondition, ForceTurnCondition, NoHeldPieceTurnCondition, PromptTurnCondition
public interface TurnCondition
This class is used to determine if the turn is over for a specific game type, and is defined in the games .xml file This class is dependant on the TurnConditionResult enum.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    TurnConditionResult isTurnOver​(GameBoard gameBoard, GamePiece gamePiece)
    This method is called to determine if the turn is over

  • Method Details

    • isTurnOver

      TurnConditionResult isTurnOver​(GameBoard gameBoard, GamePiece gamePiece)
      This method is called to determine if the turn is over
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - the GameBoard used in the current game
      gamePiece - the GamePiece which made the last move
      Returns:
      the TurnConditionResult, either SWITCH, STAY, or PROMPT depending on the game scenario
